level.text: A limited cooperative association that has dissolved or is about to dissolve may deliver to the Mayor for filing a statement of dissolution that states:
The date the association dissolved or will dissolve; and
Any other information the association considers relevant.
A person shall have notice of a limited cooperative association's dissolution on the later of:
Ninety days after a statement of dissolution is filed; or
The effective date stated in the statement of dissolution.
